page.title: 19Childrens' views of Wroxall.
page.content: I like Wroxall because the pub has got swings and a slide and a frame.My Dad goes in the garden and lets me drink his beer. ******************* I have just come back to Wroxall from Newcastle and I like it better.A lot of things have changed.For instance next door's garden has changed because she had nettles but now they're all getting chopped down.I'm sad because I used to play in them. ******************* I like our secret camp.We only have to cross our part of the stream and walk through the bushes.Sometimes we make camp fires to warm outselves. ******************* I take my dog for walks.He pulls and he chases rabbits and pheasants. ****************** I do not like towns-they're not nice.
